analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/25/0x6498f78b2f4d5624049d3efe151df4fab67bb7a4.sol:
	Contract LWRMCCToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/25/0x6498f78b2f4d5624049d3efe151df4fab67bb7a4.sol#218)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/25/0x6498f78b2f4d5624049d3efe151df4fab67bb7a4.sol#86) is not in mixedCase
